name: CyberPowerSmartHome
0:
”Alexa Turn on Light”
”Alexa Turn off Light.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The skill allows you to control your CyberPower Smart Plugs using voice commands.

Please follow the instructions to enable this skill to control your CyberPower Smart Plug:

1. Install CybetrPower SmartPlug app on your Android phone or iPhone.

2. Sign up a CyberPower SmartPlug account via CyberPower SmartPlug app.

3. Sign in to CyberPower SmartPlug app and set up a CyberPower Smart Plug. Make sure the smart plug is connected to your home Wi-Fi.

4. In the Alexa app, click "Devices" > click "YOUE SMART HOME SKILLS" > click "ENABLE SMART HOME SKILLS" > search for the skill name: "Cyber Power Smart Home" > click the skill and then click "ENABLE TO USE" to link to your CyberPower SmartPlug account.

5. Click "DISCOVER DEVICES" to add CyberPower Smart Plugs to your Alexa account.

6. Try voice commands to turn on/ off SmartPlug.
